Pilgror.description: Covers most of Pilgror with fertile plains, fortified border towns, and a long coastline.
notable_locations: Temple of Mytheris (rebuilt after the Heavenly War)

Ulgrath.description: The southern reaches of Ulgrath, bordering Zeplian lands, with strongholds to hold the line.

history.summary: The empire was formed after uniting the feuding tribes of Pilgror under one banner.
The empire spread into southern Ulgrath, constructing fortresses to defend against northern raiders.

relationships.isoran_confederacy: Distant allies, bound by mutual threats from Xiteth.

military.weaknesses: Slow to mobilize, Dependent on supply lines

symbols.banner: Golden sun on a crimson field

culture.religion: Predominantly worshippers of Sarenrae, though shrines to other gods exist.
